cli.run:latest:migration: cross-env pnpm knex migrate:up --knexfile './knexfile.ts' && pnpm gen:types && pnpm dump:database
cli.run:all:migration: cross-env pnpm knex migrate:latest --knexfile './knexfile.ts' && pnpm gen:types && pnpm dump:database
cli.rollback:latest:migration: cross-env pnpm knex migrate:rollback --knexfile './knexfile.ts' && pnpm gen:types && pnpm dump:database
cli.undo:latest:migration: cross-env pnpm knex migrate:down --knexfile './knexfile.ts' && pnpm gen:types && pnpm dump:database
cli.reset:database: cross-env ts-node './initial_migration.ts' && pnpm run:all:migration && pnpm dump:database
